definition[0]: a day when a school or organization invites the public to come in and see the work that is done there
example[0]: Parents are invited to attend the open house next Thursday.
definition[1]: if it is open house at someone’s home, people are always welcome to visit at any time
example[1]: He kept open house for a wide range of artists and writers.
definition[2]: a party at someone’s house that you can come to at any time during a particular period
example[2]: We’re having an open house Sunday, noon to 5 pm.
definition[3]: an occasion when someone who is selling their house lets everyone who is interested in buying it come to see it
